website_summaries.verdict: A complementary pairing of fruit and chocolate options for those who enjoy variety in their snacking palates.
pros: Fruity flavors include the company's tangy Lemonzest and Blueberry Bliss, alongside sweeter chocolate and caramel bars
Chewy texture is helpful for on-the-go snacks
cons: A few customers complained that the box had already been opened upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Check expiration dates!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing a follow up review.. today I opened a bar that was so bad I tossed it, I could not figure out why so I took it out of the trash and looked at the expiration date and it was way expired! I then checked another one which was also expired and out of date . Totally bummed- The bars in the box had various expiration dates some of them expired! Back to buying them in grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Peppermint = LOOKS NASTY, TASTES WORSE
customer_reviews.text: CHOCOLATE PEPPERMINT REVIEW - it’s AWFUL!! I should have purchased a single bar of each of these FIRST to make certain I liked them!! I love anything choc/peppermint and wasn’t concerned. It doesn’t LOOK appealing was the first clue. I couldn’t get two bites down!
customer_reviews.author: KingsDaughter

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty
customer_reviews.text: These were great! They are a bit on the sweet side so they were more like dessert than a snack, but I would still buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love my Luna Bars
customer_reviews.text: My expiration dates were good. All said June 2020. I have to disagree with others, I happen to love the chocolate peppermint stick. My only complaint is that I received 2 bars of the chocolate coconut and i hate coconut. I was expecting the chocolate nut bar. I love luna bars and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars but the lemon flavor is my favorite then peanut butter. It’s perfect to have in your bag just in case you need a snack
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Quite Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These bars had really good flavor, through some flavor's I did not enjoy myself. more of a personnel preference than an error on the MFG. Otherwise, I would recommend these bars, though I am only commenting on the flavor, as I did not use these as a dieting or supplementing agent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lykins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order Luna or any bars from Amazon in summer months!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this sample pack of Luna Bars. When I received them, very bar we opened was completely melted, squished, just gross. None were salvaged. They all became trash. If you want to try something like this, but a bar at a store and then order online in cooler months. Very disappointed Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, more for the calorie conscious.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, these bars were actually quite small. The emphasis appears to be natural ingredients. They did taste good, but I think you a paying for packaging instead. Cliff bars at about the same size seem to have more hearty ingredients. Bring the price down to about 12.00 and you might win a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hammer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have never had great experiences with nutrition bars. They always had a weird after taste or were very dry. Every flavor was great! I don't know if I can pick a favorite, so I'll be buying this variety pack every time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Order description says box of 12 “plus 4 bonus bars.” I only received the 12! The way the description reads, I should’ve received 16 bars.
customer_reviews.author: P. Corrales

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I had been familiar with the lemon bars, and wanted to try some others. The variety pack was just what I needed. I found two more flavors (blueberry and caramel) that I may actually like better than the lemon. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blank

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on-the-go breakfast or a snack throughout the day. All the flavors taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Iheartamazon

customer_reviews.title: Lunar bars are the best to have around in this mix assortment!!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy indeed! There were plenty to share with family including the nice dental staff to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: SchnauzerMom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste right
customer_reviews.text: Assortment does not taste good. Hardly any good flavors. Clif bars are more filling and don’t taste like a diet product like this one
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get a set of bars as mentioned in the package, supposed to be chocolate/peanut butter and not cocunut, which I’m not able to eat these, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Going to buy again great price for All. Good flavor
customer_reviews.author: Chevaneese Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of flavors. Never knew they're were so many different kinds of Luna bars
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Children like
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandchild who has celiac disease. She’s 3 and loves them. So does the 20 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love these variety packs. I stock up when prices are low on here.
customer_reviews.author: rauschaus

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Taste better than I expected. Pricey, but I hope they go on sale again.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wright

customer_reviews.title: Luna bars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good flavor but the price is a little high
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don't eat the peppermint
customer_reviews.text: The bars in the combo box are all good, except the peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Betsill

customer_reviews.title: Delicious,  my whole family enjoyed these.
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious. My whole family enjoyed these and I will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Bars
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the Lemon Zest and Peppermint Chocolate bars. Often have one for breakfast and/or break.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fulwider

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convienient
customer_reviews.text: I send them to my daughter who is in college. She likes to grab one before going to her first class or to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for trying a variety of flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you want to try out luna bars before committing to a box of the same flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars and this is a good variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but not super filling
customer_reviews.text: Richly flavored, but do not stay with you very long. Variety pack is very convenient. Definitely paid one with a cup of coffee or a piece of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the variety of this box. They come in a box that you can take out and put in your pantry. The flavors are great. We like the lemon one a lot in our household.
customer_reviews.author: E. Evens

customer_reviews.title: the best bars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bars i ever had. I like the lemon bars but other flavors are also good. I can eat them without guilt
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Turns out i really like the lemon so reodered a box of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product need to work on packaging for delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the variety. Unfortunately it wasn't packaged in the luna box. Instead the bars were in a bag in my amazon box. When I got home and grabbed my amazon box the luna bars were slightly melted. As well as smooshed together.
customer_reviews.author: miriam rivera cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Deliciousness!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, I cannot keep them on hand constantly, as I have no will power with them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in such a cute box! I love Luna bars. Bought this product twice already!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: How old were these??
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't read the date on the box as it was faded off, but the bars themselves were melted and stale. I'll never order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mika Boblitz-Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Snack
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves the variety pack. She packs them in her lunch for a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Antone

customer_reviews.title: Tasted Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought the variety pack and thought I would get the Nutz Over Chocolate but instead was given Chocolate Dipped Coconut. Also, I think they are smaller than the bars I buy at my local grocery store, but they tasted fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the energy bar at the top is deforms because of the pressure, but overall it's good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but the description isn't accurate. I didn't get the 4 bonus bars in the variety pack, only 12 total.
customer_reviews.author: Ted S

customer_reviews.title: Good, but read thoroughly. It’s 12 total, including the 4 extra bars.
customer_reviews.text: While these are good, there is not 4 bonus bars. It’s 12 total. So basically it’s an 8 pack, with 4 bonus bars. Just be aware when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ordered the wrong bar
customer_reviews.text: ordered the wrong brand. Gave them to my brother since I can't eat these.
customer_reviews.author: garden lady

customer_reviews.title: I got sick
customer_reviews.text: I just got sick and looked at expiration date April 2016
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Taste amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super tasty. Very healthy. Wish they was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly morris

customer_reviews.title: Close to expiry date...
customer_reviews.text: I received this sampler box on June 30 and noticed bars dated to expire August 28 of this year. Disappointed in freshness. Otherwise mixed bag of flavors: I hated blueberry, liked the chocolate coconut. Freshness factor super disappointing though. Always a risk to order food from amazon....
customer_reviews.author: MBR

customer_reviews.title: Glad I sampled all the flavor protein bars before buying more of any one bar. Saved me money !
customer_reviews.text: I love the coconut Luna protein bars. The flavor, crunch factor and value are excellent. However, the only other flavor that was yummy is the blueberry bar. I personally didn't like the remaining flavor bars in this sample box. Just my taste bud selection, yours may differ.
customer_reviews.author: marci record

customer_reviews.title: Muted taste!
customer_reviews.text: Muted taste. Have a separate box of Lemon ones. In combo box didn’t taste very lemony. But there great in separate box. I think the blueberry should be good in separate box too. Guess I better get those. Choc peppermint were good too. Thought they were gonna have cherry with the red package. All tasted ok but muted taste.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good flavor, but too sweet!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was pretty good, but I found them to be too sweet. If you are trying to curb your sugar addiction, these will not help. The lemon bar was surprisingly lemony, but again, it was just too sweet for me. Kind bars are also too sweet for me, so I guess I’ll just have to put on my apron and make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Lacemaker427

customer_reviews.title: Beware Soy Protein isolate
customer_reviews.text: Could be ok but without Soy protein isolate witch can cause thyroid problems and even lower ones ldl. Throwing away 2 boxes...
customer_reviews.author: kimajohn

customer_reviews.title: No one likes them.
customer_reviews.text: My kids eat a lot of bars when we’re traveling or out and about and they love most of them but these are gross. None of my kids like any of the flavors except the chocolate cupcake (not in this set) and even that they don’t want me to buy again. These are over priced for the size also. Back to zbars.
customer_reviews.author: janedoe consumer

customer_reviews.title: Assorted Luna Bars
customer_reviews.text: I use them as a protein snack. Especially, I like the "lemon" flavor. "Gluten Free" is an advertising hype to raise the price. Most of us NEED gluten. If there was none in any food, we'd be in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Downeaster

customer_reviews.title: Very good protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I buy these bars often, they’re very good for a protein bar and this is a better deal than at the store. This box was delivered in a timely manner but wasn’t packaged in a cold box, which it should have been because the bars arrived melted. Threw them in the freezer so they should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffer for my wife. She said these have an odd consistency and taste like rice crisps with some flavor. She said she would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GregBooks

customer_reviews.title: Variety
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the variety pack. It allows me to try many of the flavors that I cannot find as single purchases in the grocery store. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C.Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Picture says "Plus 4 Bonus Bars", but did not have bonus bars
customer_reviews.text: The advertising is misleading. It indicates that there are 4 bonus bars, but all you get is a standard pack of 12.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Holy SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to be healthy... HUGE AMOUNTS OF SUGAR!!!!! Took of my subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: lori arguin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to try once.
customer_reviews.text: Box was quite banged up and some of the bars were squished, but plastic packaging over the product didn’t rip so what ever. This was a good way to try different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, but expensive for a bar.
customer_reviews.text: I love these luna bars and every flavor was delicious, however I got them on sale during prime day, and I don't think I would pay full price for them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory G.

customer_reviews.title: Bars no longer have the same calcium content.
customer_reviews.text: Luna bars used to have 350 mg of calcium (35% of calcium needs). Now they do not, according to the label. I used to count on them to help fill my calcium needs, so I consider that the new ones are much less useful or desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Great flavors.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. Great flavor. Great value. Awesome freshness. Loves these. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kitty64

customer_reviews.title: Crushed and deformed bars in the box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this item ... The box had no appearance of damage and looked perfect ... When I opened the box the bars were deformed and crushed ... Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SKJsparky111

customer_reviews.title: Their flavor is awesome/ will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: The lemon one is great; all the ones Ive tried are fabulous. But then, you can't go wrong with Cliff bar
customer_reviews.author: marianne cunniff

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as they’re easier to eat if you have TMJ. Great flavors and texture.
customer_reviews.author: L. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Can’t review until the bars are opened.
customer_reviews.text: This product was left in the very hot sun. When I opened the box and felt the bars, I found that some were very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph blasch

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: my wife needed a snack bar variety and this provided it at a good cost.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: They have a great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they came in a box and have a great taste! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Long

customer_reviews.title: Tasty protein bars
customer_reviews.text: Love Luna products. Have purchased them locally until recently. Our store stopped carrying them, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: F. Nylander

customer_reviews.title: Love Luna
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved these bars cutest presentation and great flavors we will love eating
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Loves These
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing variety pack and everyone in my family has a favorite (even the picky eater). They're a good size and a great value. Repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Luna Bars
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and the flavors are all the ones I buy. I will definitely use auto delivery for these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great way to find out which you like better. I also sent one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice snack bar
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars, taty, just the right size, use them at work.
customer_reviews.author: Rafe J.

customer_reviews.title: The add was deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: The add states one dozen, plus four free. I received a dozen but no additional four free bars.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Aliff Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy and loved getting some mystery flavors. The surprise new caramel flavor is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Theses bars are so good. I eat one or two as meal replacement or as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought a second box. The different flavors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied being able to sample different flavors for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Gluten free. Large variety but l do not like all of them. Ordering box of one box of my favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Oakland

product_meta.title: Luna BAR - Gluten Free Bars - Variety Pack - Flavors May Vary (1.69 Ounce Snack Bars, 12 Count) (Packaging & Assortment May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Variety PackLUNA Whole Nutrition Snack Bars are crafted to help keep you nourished throughout your busy day and give you the energy to break through. Each bar is a delicious, gluten-free, vegan snacks that’s perfect between meals.
feature_bullets: MORE OF THE STUFF YOU WANT: 8g protein and a low-glycemic index.
LESS OF THE STUFF YOU DON’T: Gluten free, with no artificial flavors or high-fructose corn syrup.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Plant-based, complete protein from soy provides essential amino acids. Carbohydrates come from organic oats and a blend of sugars with a low-glycemic index.
DELICIOUS FLAVORS AND VARIETY: LUNA Bars come in twelve craveable flavors.
CONVENIENCE: Wholesome, delicious on-the-go vegan snacks for energy whenever and wherever you need it

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
